page.title: 17GROUPS AND CLUBS
page.content:
THE MOTHER AND TODDLER CLUB MEETS ONE AFTERNOON WEEKLY DURING TERM TIME.IT AIMS TO PROVIDE PLAY WITH EQUIPMENT FOR UNDER SCHOOL AGE CHILDREN AND SOCIAL TIME FOR MOTHERS.
BROWNIES ARE THE JUNIOR BRANCH OF THE GIRL GUIDE ASSOCIATION FOR GIRLS 7-11 YEARS.IT HOLDS WEEKLY MEETINGS IN THE SCHOOL HALL.
THE YOUTH CLUB MEETS IN THE SCOUT HUT WEEKLY FOR BOTH BOYS AND GIRLS.
THE OVER 60'S CLUB MEET IN THE VILLAGE HALL WEEKLY TO PROVIDE SOCIAL TIME FOR RETIRED PEOPLE OF BOTH SEXES.
THE WOMENS INSTITUTE MEETS MONTHLY AND AIMS TO PROMOTE FELLOWSHIP AND EDUCATION FOR COUNTRY WOMEN.
